root: ^My father made me an appointment to get my car inspected but my acquaintance %FirstName:Npc:2% is having a pool party.
^Go to the appointment, skip the pool party
^Call and cancel the appointment and go to the pool party
^Push the appointment to tomorrow and go to the pool party
^Don’t call, just go to the pool party

res1: ^My father is proud of me and buys me a jacket but %FirstName:Npc:2% and other kids get annoyed at me for not showing.
^%FirstName:Npc:2% and other kids at the pool party got mad at me for not showing, but I feel good knowing my father is proud of me, and this jacket is a nice reward!
res2: ^My dad gets upset with me but doesn’t really talk much to me when I get home, though I have fun at the pool party.
^I had a great time with %FirstName:Npc:2% and everyone else but coming home and seeing my father so quiet and annoyed really made me feel awful.
res3: ^My father’s proud of me for being responsible, %FirstName:Npc:2% and other kids become closer to me but I get into an accident on the way to my rescheduled appointment.
^Everyone was happy with me, my father, all the kids at the pool party, but the accident I got in the next morning ruined my mood... and my car...
res4: ^My father gets mad at me and grounds me when I return but I have a blast at the pool party!
^Sometimes the price you have to pay for being popular is to have your father be annoyed with you and ground you. Hopefully not permanently or anything...
